name: Twins Dash
summary:
Twins Dash is an one-tap challenging game. All you have to do is tapping to make characters jump and avoid obstacles. Oh yes, characters! You have to control 2 characters running on 2 lanes at the same time! Double the fun!
It's all about timing and deciding. Sometimes you have to use your brain to figure out how to get through. Just try again and again and again.
Each chapter has an unique gameplay, so you won't feel bored.
Enjoy exploring the world of Twins with simple, colorful chalkboard-like graphic.
